amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 110-349 to clarify that a standard will only beneeded if diacetyl is still in use. Second, it clarifies that Section 4, calling for a NIOSH study, applies to potential substitutes for diacetyl.

action.text: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. George Miller.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller, George amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
